steps.name: Given I open Mars Airline home page
When I search flight with "December (next year)", "July (next year)" and ""
Select item 'December (next year)' in 'Departing' dropdown element
Select item 'July (next year)' in 'Returning' dropdown element
page load --waiting for new page to load--
Then I should see "Unfortunately, this schedule is not possible. Please try again." message
Validate element 'Search Result Text Message' should contains text: 'Unfortunately, this schedule is not possible. Please try again.'

assert expected **[

, 1 more... ]** to contain text **Unfortunately, this schedule is not possible. Please try again.**, but the text was **Sorry, there are no more seats available. Back**

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Basic Search Flow, Invalid Return Dates
